casebody.data:
In the Matter of The Application of Henry Jacoby. Decided March 6, 1888. Appeal by Henry Jacoby from an order denying his application for an order of alternative mandamus. Henry B. B. Staples, for appellant. Boeder & Bernard, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Truax, J.

Per Curiam.

Order affirmed without costs.
